sentences.sContent: After that we went to the zoo.
sentences.sContent_eng: After that we went to the zoo.
sentences.sCn: 之后我们一起去了动物园。

sentences.sContent: On Sunday I go to the zoo.
sentences.sContent_eng: On Sunday I go to the zoo.
sentences.sCn: 星期日的时候我去了动物园。

sentences.sContent: I like to go to zoo.

words.tran: 动物病；[动] 动物传染病

trans.tranOther: a place, usually in a city, where animals of many kinds are kept so that people can go to look at them
